title: Cuelist
description: Generated from 02-dictionary/artifacts/cuelist_ENRICHED.md. Audio Director's slice-level index of audio cues, each linked to its Audio Plan while keeping player-facing surfaces safe.

edited.description: Date this cuelist was last edited.

owner.description: Role maintaining the cuelist; fixed to Audio Director.

scope.description: Player-safe slice description (1-2 lines) detailing coverage for this cuelist.

dormancy.description: Dormancy state, including deferral tagging when plan-only.

snapshot.description: Cold snapshot reference in format "Cold @ YYYY-MM-DD".

tu.description: Origin TU Brief identifier in format TU-YYYY-MM-DD-<role><seq>.

neighbors.description: Roles impacted by this cuelist; must include audioproducer, style, translator, pn, gatekeeper, and binder.

purpose_mix.description: Purpose distribution summary (counts for clarify, recall, mood, signpost, pace) matching the cue table.

placement_policy.description: Player-safe summary of where cues enter or exit relative to prose.

accessibility_summary.description: Slice-level accessibility confirmation covering captions and onset safety.

cues.description: Table of audio cues, one per slot, with player-safe descriptors.

cue_id.description: Kebab-case cue identifier that links to the Audio Plan.

audio_plan_reference.description: Relative path or identifier for the corresponding Audio Plan artifact.

purpose.description: Primary audio purpose for this cue.

placement.description: Short description of cue timing relative to prose or choices.

description.description: Plain-language cue description with no production technique details.

caption.description: Player-safe caption or text equivalent enclosed in square brackets.

anchor_targets.description: List of manuscript paths anchored by this cue.

status.description: Current production status for the cue.

inclusion_exclusion_rules.description: Optional notes capturing non-obvious placement rules or masking risks.

localization_style_notes.description: Slice-level localization and style guidance bullets aligned with Style Addendum and Codex entries.

accessibility_checklist.description: Accessibility checklist items that must be confirmed before handoff.

binder_note.description: Binder instructions covering View updates and cue options.

pn_note.description: PN coordination note on narration cadence and breath timing.

hooks_filed.description: Optional follow-up hooks filed from this cuelist.

done_checklist.description: Completion checklist verifying readiness before handing off to the Audio Producer.

quality_bar.description: One of 8 Quality Bars (see taxonomies.md ยง5)

loop_name.description: One of 13 TU loop types (see taxonomies.md ยง3 and loop_names.md)

deferral_tag.description: Deferral type for dormant roles (see taxonomies.md ยง7)
